availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Russell (Todd Co, Ky, attorney and prov govt)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, attorney and prov govt. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Lauria Russell. Father of Lydia J. Russell, James D. Russell, Charles M. Russell, Margaret Russell, Robert Russell, Mary Russell, and Nannie Russell. Attorney in Todd County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Todd County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 2, p. 249A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 687.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District 4, p. 330A.
Find A Grave, "James A. Russell (Oct. 1, 1814-Nov. 22, 1889)," Memorial #48256064 , http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/48256064 (accessed October 16, 2019).
